creator: bryan.basham@sun.com
text:
Basically, the implementation of RequestDispatcher does not handle forwarding
or including static HTML pages.  This manifests in a variety of ways including
(a) using a RequestDispatcher object in servlet code, (b) using the jsp:include
tag refering to a static page, and my most recent discovery (c) using declarativ
security where the <location> element refers to a static HTML page.
